errors.error_description: Mixed dependency version specifications - some have specific versions while others don't, creating potential conflicts
correction_candidates: Remove all version specifications and use latest versions for all dependencies
Add specific version numbers for all dependencies to ensure consistency
Use version ranges (e.g., >=2.25.0) instead of exact versions
Keep only critical dependencies with version specifications
errors.golden_answer: Remove all version specifications and use latest versions for all dependencies

errors.error_description: Inconsistent command paths - step 2 uses 'python holo.py' while other steps use 'python src/holo.py'
correction_candidates: Change step 2 to use 'python src/holo.py -m setup' for consistency
Update all commands to use 'python holo.py' without src/ prefix
Add 'cd src/' instruction before step 2 to match the path
Use relative path './src/holo.py' for all commands
errors.golden_answer: Change step 2 to use 'python src/holo.py -m setup' for consistency
